text: Hannu Antero Lahtinen (20 September 1960 – November 2020) was a Finnish greco- roman style wrestler. He competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics. Lahtinen was born in Jalasjärvi. Lahtinen died from amyotrophic lateral sclerosis in Helsinki in November 2020 at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Finland Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Wrestlers
title: Hannu Lahtinen
